Credits¶

This ap­plic­a­tion was written by Ben Welsh, Ken Schwencke and Armand Emamdjomeh at the Los Angeles Times Data Desk.

The ideas be­hind django-bakery were first presented at the 2012 con­fer­ence of the Na­tion­al In­sti­tute for Com­puter-As­sisted Re­port­ing. The NICAR com­munity is a con­stant source of chal­lenge and in­spir­a­tion. Many of our ideas, here and else­where, have been ad­ap­ted from things the com­munity has taught us.
